pages.text: A $(l:useables/jukebox)$(item)Jukebox$() playing music from a $(l:rare/music_discs)$(item)Music Disc$() emits a level 15 signal, powering any adjacent $(l:redstone/redstone_components#redstone)$(item)Redstone Wires$(), $(l:redstone/redstone_components#repeater)$(item)Repeaters$(), and mechanism components. $(br2)The signal turns off when the music track ends or if the disc is removed before the track ends. $(br)If the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() places a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#comparator)$(item)Comparator$() besides a $(item)Jukebox$(),

the intensity of the redstone signal depends on the disc currently inserted. $(br2)The $(l:redstone/redstone_components#comparator)$(item)Comparator$() is powered as long as a disc is stored inside the $(item)Jukebox$(), even if it has stopped playing.
